pr_title: Use ID Tag UserNames in Block / Memory Tables

timeline.message:
Use ID Tag UserNames in Block / Memory Tables

ID Tag Table attempts to use Reporter UserName
Fixes possible deference in IDTagTable

timeline.bodyText: Since we know the object is a Bean, shouldn't we use getDisplayName instead of toString?
timeline.author: pabender

replies.bodyText: OH wait, I forgot that Blocks can contain other objects, like strings... so getDisplayName could be applied for beans, but it isn't always applicable
replies.author: pabender
